About me

Hello! My name is Rifky, and I am a Computer and Network Engineering (TKJ) student at SMK Mekanik Cibinong. With a strong passion for technology, I focus on learning about network systems, hardware, and their integration in solving real-world challenges.

I am especially excited about cybersecurity and virtualization technologies like VMware and VirtualBox. I believe these fields are essential in creating secure and efficient digital environments, and I enjoy exploring how they can be applied to enhance system reliability and security.

Looking forward, I aspire to become an expert in data, computers, and networking, contributing to innovative solutions in the ever-evolving world of technology. My dedication to learning and adapting ensures I am ready to tackle new challenges and make a meaningful impact in the tech industry.
